title: FullStack Developer
description: I create API's for communication between backend and frontend and I develop web or mobile applications according to the needs of the project.

welcome: Hello! I'm Bryan Ochoa. Welcome to my portfolio web
description: Since I started my journey in web development 4 years ago I have developed personal projects and 2 years working formally for companies developing web and mobile applications, below you can browse the work I have done.

title: Frontend Developer
description: I enjoy creating the applications from my perspective and bringing to life the designs that come to mind.

title: Backend Developer
description: I am skilled when it comes to solving problems focused on backend development.

title: Instructor
description: In my spare time I enjoy teaching other future developers the web technologies that I know and that I have learned throughout my career as a developer.
subtitle: Courses Taught:

title: GasPrices
description: It was a project with which I graduated as an engineer, it was done for the company gasosur which consists of showing the gasoline prices for the state of Guerrero using the data provided by the government portal.

title: QRUD
description: It was a project with which I graduated as an engineer, was made for the company gasosur which consists in the registration of users and then use their information to generate a QR code which after being scanned recognizes the user information and displays their data on a form to subsequently perform the billing process.

title: Clipboard
description: It was a project developed with tailwind css and react that served as a basis for me to understand the structure of the framework and create a design considered a standard in the web environment.

title: Frontend Store
description: It was a project with which I learned how to do layout in HTML and native CSS, using GRID properties to build the design of a store selling products.

title: Shadow Technology
description: It was a project with which I reinforced my knowledge in layout using the css framework known as Tailwind based on utility classes to create the different elements that make up the site.

title: Shadow Inventory System
description: It is a template developed in react with the objective of acting as an inventory system adaptable to the client's needs.

title: Shadow Music
description: It is a web application developed in react using the Spotify API.

title: Shadow POS
description: It is a point of sale developed in Next and Nest implementing the tailwind css framework and the use of the new Next design pattern.
